channel.title: Block This Guy...Real Vandalism
channel.description:
MY IP ban command doesnt work. I wanna make this IP inside my client.java or something so it is indeed ip banned.
This guy logs in 80+ accs with symbols in the name. The symbols even make my computer tower beep.
Then my net will die and I gotta call the damn cable company to get the net back up :(
ool-18b92509.dyn.optonline.net
Is the IP. Can someone make and if/else code so that ip can't login?

item.title: Block This Guy...Real Vandalism

@EliteKill101 wrote:

that was probally a different crashers IP so it wont help but ne ways if you still wanna run your server i suggest using hamachi until this all goes away…

item.title: Block This Guy...Real Vandalism
item.dc:creator: @Got_Java Got Java?
item.description:
@Got_Java wrote:

[quote=“EliteKill101, post:17, topic:124063”]well thanks for the input and idk about the police though but java might be right…[/quote]Of Course i am right. And if you don’t want it happening…The MoparScape Crasher…I suggest you maybe code your server so it only accepts connections from moparscape clients.

Lazer23:

No, they sent multiple (perhaps authorized, but still unnecessary) requests that brought a tower down.

So the server crashers might get a small fine…But for the hosters who involved the police will be like sent to jail lmao

Are you seriously like 5 years old? Maybe if you would stop putting so many exclamation marks and yelling like someone is pulling on your nuts, you just may get help. I can see you as a William Hung impersonation. No seriously, I heard this SYI guy has been crashing servers for a while now.[/quote]
